Row.Text: Great General spawn rate +50% and +15% combat bonus.+30%[ICON_STRENGTH] when fighting a [ICON_CITY_STATE] or it's units. Embarked units +1[ICON_MOVES] and no penalty to move from sea to land. Melee units pillage for free. Units fight like they were at full [ICON_STRENGTH] when damaged. Receive 3x[ICON_GOLD] from Barbarian encampments and pillaging.
